name: Sensory Overload
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Psychic Anthology © 2017, Paizo Inc.
text: You overload the target creature's senses, making it difficult for the target to concentrate. For the duration of the effect, the target must succeed at a Will save at the same DC as the original effect to perform any standard or full-round action. On a failure, the creature loses the action that triggered the saving throw. If successful, the creature is able to take the action, but this spell effect is not negated.
savingThrow_zh: 意志，通过则无效（见描述）
text_zh: 你过载了目标生物的感官，让目标难以集中精神。在持续时间里，目标在尝试进行任何标准动作或者整轮动作时，必须成功通过一次与初始效果相同DC的意志豁免。豁免失败时，该生物失去触发该次豁免的动作。如果豁免成功，该生物可以进行该动作，但是这个法术效果不会结束。
